languages.text: Новатор Кассия Орселлио и Вольный Торговец {name} фон Валанциус заключили брачный союз, скрепивший могучий альянс. Увы, изобилие дел и обязательств не давали супругам часто видеться, принуждая их разлучаться на месяцы и даже годы. И пусть в браке этом они не обрели страсти и любви, но испытывали друг к другу искреннее уважение.

Novator Cassia Orsellio and Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius were joined in matrimony, securing a powerful alliance. Sadly, their countless concerns and responsibilities prevented the spouses from seeing much of one other, keeping them apart for months and sometimes years at a time. Although no passion or love kindled in their union, they held one other in genuine esteem.
languages.original_text: Новатор Кассия Орселлио и Вольный Торговец {name} фон Валанциус заключили брачный союз, скрепивший могучий альянс. Увы, изобилие дел и обязательств не давали супругам часто видеться, принуждая их разлучаться на месяцы и даже годы. И пусть в браке этом они не обрели страсти и любви, но испытывали друг к другу искреннее уважение.

traits.locale_text: Novator Cassia Orsellio and the Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius entered into a marriage union, that secured a powerful alliance. Sadly, countless concerns and responsibilities prevented the spouses from seeing each other, keeping them apart for months and sometimes years. Even if they didn't find passion or love in this marriage, they truly held each other in great respect.

Novator Cassia Orsellio and the Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius entered into a marriage union, that secured a powerful alliance. Sadly, countless concerns and responsibilities prevented the spouses from seeing each other, keeping them apart for months and sometimes years. Even if they didn't find passion or love in this marriage, they truly held each other in great respect.

Novator Cassia Orsellio and Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius entered into marriage, securing a powerful alliance. Sadly, their countless concerns and responsibilities prevented the spouses from seeing each other, keeping them apart for months and sometimes years. Even without passion or love in marriage, they truly held great respect for each other.

Novator Cassia Orsellio and Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius entered into marriage, securing a powerful alliance. Sadly, their countless concerns and responsibilities prevented the spouses from seeing each other, keeping them apart for months and sometimes years. Even without passion or love in marriage, they truly held great respect for each other.

Novator Cassia Orsellio and Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius were joined in matrimony, securing a powerful alliance. Sadly, their countless concerns and responsibilities prevented the spouses from seeing much of one other, keeping them apart for months and sometimes years at a time. Although no passion or love kindled in their union, they held one other in genuine esteem.

Novator Cassia Orsellio and Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius were joined in matrimony, securing a powerful alliance. Sadly, their countless concerns and responsibilities prevented the spouses from seeing much of one other, keeping them apart for months and sometimes years at a time. Although no passion or love kindled in their union, they held one other in genuine esteem.

languages.text: 大族长卡西娅·奥赛罗与行商浪人{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯结为夫妻，组建了强大的联盟。遗憾的是，他们各自肩负着无数事务和责任，可能连续几个月，有时甚至连续好几年都无法见面。不过，即便他们的结合没有激情与爱情，他们也真诚地尊重彼此。
languages.original_text: Novator Cassia Orsellio and Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius were joined in matrimony, securing a powerful alliance. Sadly, their countless concerns and responsibilities prevented the spouses from seeing much of one other, keeping them apart for months and sometimes years at a time. Although no passion or love kindled in their union, they held one other in genuine esteem.

traits.locale_text: 大族长卡西娅·奥塞罗与行商浪人{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯结为夫妻，组建了强大的联盟。遗憾的是，他们各自肩负着无数事务和责任，可能连续几个月，甚至连续好几年都无法见面。不过，即便这样的婚姻中没有激情与爱情，他们也依然非常尊重彼此。

languages.text: Novatorin Cassia Orsellio und {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} {name} von Valancius gingen eine Ehe ein, die ein mächtiges Bündnis begründete. Bedauerlicherweise hinderten ihre unzähligen Sorgen und Pflichten die Ehepartner daran, sich regelmäßig zu sehen. Oft vergingen zwischen ihren Begegnungen Monate, manchmal sogar Jahre. Obwohl ihre Union nicht von Leidenschaft oder Liebe geprägt war, schätzten sie sich sehr.
languages.original_text: Novator Cassia Orsellio and Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius were joined in matrimony, securing a powerful alliance. Sadly, their countless concerns and responsibilities prevented the spouses from seeing much of one other, keeping them apart for months and sometimes years at a time. Although no passion or love kindled in their union, they held one other in genuine esteem.

traits.locale_text: Novatorin Cassia Orsellio und {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} {name} von Valancius gingen eine Ehe ein, durch die ein mächtiges Bündnis entstand. Bedauerlicherweise hinderten ihre unzähligen Sorgen und Pflichten die Ehepartner daran, sich regelmäßig zu sehen. Oft vergingen zwischen ihren Begegnungen Monate, manchmal Jahre. Auch wenn ihre Ehe nicht auf Leidenschaft oder Liebe basierte, sie empfanden sie doch große Hochachtung füreinander.

languages.text: La Novator Cassia Orsellio et {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} {name} von Valancius furent {mf|unis|unies} par les liens du mariage, nouant ainsi une puissante alliance. Malheureusement, leurs nombreuses responsabilités et préoccupations ne leur permettaient de se voir qu'en de rares occasions, espacées de plusieurs mois voire plusieurs années. Bien que cette union fût dénuée de passion et d'amour, elle n'en était pas moins basée sur le respect mutuel que se vouaient les deux {mf|époux|épouses}.
languages.original_text: Novator Cassia Orsellio and Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius were joined in matrimony, securing a powerful alliance. Sadly, their countless concerns and responsibilities prevented the spouses from seeing much of one other, keeping them apart for months and sometimes years at a time. Although no passion or love kindled in their union, they held one other in genuine esteem.

traits.locale_text: La Novator Cassia Orsellio et {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} {name} von Valancius furent {mf|unis|unies} par les liens du mariage, nouant ainsi une puissante alliance. Malheureusement, leurs nombreuses responsabilités et préoccupations ne leur permettaient de se voir qu'en de rares occasions, espacées de plusieurs mois voire plusieurs années. Bien que cette union fût dénuée de passion et d'amour, elle n'en était pas moins basée sur le respect mutuel que se vouaient les deux {mf|époux|épouses}.

languages.text: La Novator Cassia Orsellio y el Comerciante Independiente {name} von Valancius se unieron en matrimonio, firmando una poderosa alianza. Por desgracia, sus innumerables deberes y responsabilidades impedían a la pareja verse con frecuencia, por lo que llegaban a pasar meses e incluso años separados. Aun sin pasión ni amor en su unión, ambos tenían en verdadera estima a la otra persona.
languages.original_text: Novator Cassia Orsellio and Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius were joined in matrimony, securing a powerful alliance. Sadly, their countless concerns and responsibilities prevented the spouses from seeing much of one other, keeping them apart for months and sometimes years at a time. Although no passion or love kindled in their union, they held one other in genuine esteem.

traits.locale_text: La Novator Cassia Orsellio y el Comerciante Independiente {name} von Valancius se unieron en matrimonio, firmando una poderosa alianza. Por desgracia, sus innumerables deberes y responsabilidades impedían a la pareja verse con frecuencia, por lo que llegaban a pasar meses e incluso años separados. Aun sin pasión ni amor en su unión, ambos sentían un profundo respeto por la otra persona.

languages.text: ノベイターであるカシア・オーセリオと自由開拓者である{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスは結婚し、強力な同盟関係を築いた。しかし悲しいことに、数え切れないほどの懸念や責任から、夫婦はお互いにあまり会うことができず、数ヶ月、時には数年間も離れ離れになっていた。結婚生活において情熱や愛情というものはなかったが、二人は互いを心から尊敬していた。
languages.original_text: Novator Cassia Orsellio and Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius were joined in matrimony, securing a powerful alliance. Sadly, their countless concerns and responsibilities prevented the spouses from seeing much of one other, keeping them apart for months and sometimes years at a time. Although no passion or love kindled in their union, they held one other in genuine esteem.

traits.locale_text: ノベイターであるカシア・オーセリオと自由開拓者である{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスは結婚し、強力な同盟関係を築いた。しかし悲しいことに、数え切れないほどの懸念や責任から、夫婦はお互いにあまり会うことができず、数ヶ月、時には数年間も離れ離れになっていた。結婚生活において情熱や愛情というものはなかったが、二人は互いを心から尊敬していた。

languages.text: Rota Reisi Cassia Orsellio ve Hür Tacir {name} von Valancius, evlenerek güçlü bir ittifak kurdu. Ne yazık ki sayısız tasa ve sorumluluk, eşlerin birbirini sık sık görmesine engel oldu; onları bazen aylarca, bazen yıllarca ayrı tuttu. Bu birliktelikte herhangi bir tutku veya aşk peyda olmamış olsa da ikili, birbirlerine samimi bir saygı besledi.
languages.original_text: Novator Cassia Orsellio and Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius were joined in matrimony, securing a powerful alliance. Sadly, their countless concerns and responsibilities prevented the spouses from seeing much of one other, keeping them apart for months and sometimes years at a time. Although no passion or love kindled in their union, they held one other in genuine esteem.

traits.locale_text: Rota Reisi Cassia Orsellio ve Hür Tacir {name} von Valancius evlendi ve güçlü bir ittifak meydana getirdi. Ne yazık ki sayısız tasa ve sorumluluk, eşlerin birbirini sık sık görmesine engel oldu; onları bazen aylarca, bazen yıllarca ayrı tuttu. Bu birliktelikte herhangi bir tutku veya aşk peyda olmamış olsa da, ikili birbirlerine samimi bir saygı besledi.
